description: Proposed change of use from a vacant charity shop (Use Class E) into a Pub (Sui generis - drinking establishment) and installation of new shop fronts to both frontages.
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Construction Management Plan</span></p><p>No development shall take place until a detailed Demolition and Construction Management Plan covering the matters set out below has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall only be implemented in accordance with the details and measures approved as part of the demolition and construction management plan, which shall be maintained throughout the entire construction period.&nbsp;&nbsp;<br></p><ul><li style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The construction prog</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">ramme including a timeframe for the works</span></li><li style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The number/ frequency and size of construction vehicles </span></li><li style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Construction traffic routes</span></li><li style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Location of deliveries during construction</span></li><li style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Pedestrian and vehicular access arrangements; and</span></li><li style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Any temporary road/ footway closures during the construction period.&nbsp;</span><br></li></ul><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">REASON: To avoid hazard and obstruction being caused to users of the public highway and in the interest of public safety and amenity.<br></p>

<p>The use hereby permitted may only operate between (0800 ) hours and (2300 ) hours on weekdays and Saturdays and between (0800 ) hours and (2200 ) hours on Sundays and Public Holidays.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise.</p><div><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div>

<p>Cycle parking for 4 cycles shall be provided within the site prior to the commencement of the hereby approved use and shall permanently be retained and maintained thereafter.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: In the interests of promoting sustainable modes of transport and encourage cycling across the Borough.&nbsp;</p>

<p>The external terrace area with associated tables and chairs shall only operate between the hours of 0800 and 2100 daily.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">The hours of servicing deliveries to the site shall be restricted to between 0700 and 1900 from Monday to Saturday.&nbsp; There shall be no deliveries on Sundays or Bank holidays.<br></p><div><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-095766d3-7fff-3aaa-8e10-29a5533f730f" style=""><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-095766d3-7fff-3aaa-8e10-29a5533f730f" style=""><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise.</span></span><br></span></div>

<p>Waste shall only be moved from the basement storage area to Chatsworth Road for collection at the designated time of waste collection and shall not be left on street overnight.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure there are plans in place for the storage and collection of waste.&nbsp;</p>
